Lost Eye.Effect: The Lost Eye is gone. -4 to Ranged Attacks & Perception Checks involving vision. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.

Brain Injury.Effect: -2 to all Actions. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.

Damaged Eye.Effect: -2 to Ranged Attacks & Perception Checks involving vision.
Damaged Eye.Treatment: Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently.

Concussion.Treatment: Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently.

Broken Jaw.Treatment: Paramedic DV13, Paramedic or Surgery DV13

Foreign Object.Effect: At the end of every Turn where you move further than 4m/yds on foot, you re-suffer this Critical Injury's Bonus Damage directly to your Hit Points.
Foreign Object.Treatment: Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently.

Whiplash.Effect: Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.
Whiplash.Treatment: Paramedic DV13, Paramedic or Surgery DV13

Cracked Skull.Effect: Aimed Shots to your head multiply the damage that gets through your SP by 3 instead of 2. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.
Cracked Skull.Treatment: Paramedic DV15, Paramedic or Surgery DV15

Damaged Ear.Effect: Whenever you move further than 4m/yds on foot in a Turn, you cannot take a Move Action on your next Turn. Additionally you take a -2 to Perception Checks involving hearing.
Damaged Ear.Treatment: Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently.

Crushed Windpipe.Effect: You cannot speak. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.
